ans = []
for i in range(1, 1001):
    ans.append(' '.join((str(i), '1', str(i), '2')))
ans.append('1 1 1 2')
for i in range(1, 1001):
    ans.append(' '.join((str(i), '1', str(i), '2')))

print(len(ans))
print('\n'.join(ans))

print('2000')
a = 1
b = 1000
for i in range(1000):
    print(a, 1, a, 2)
    a += 1
for i in range(1000):
    print(b, 1, b, 2)
    b -= 1

print(1999)
for i in range(1, 1001):
    print(i, 1, i, 2)
p = 1000
while p != 1:
    print(p, 1, p, 2)
    p-=1

print(1998)
[print(i, 1, i, 2) for k in range(2) for i in range(1, 1000)]

print(1998); f = lambda: [print(i, 1, i, 2) for i in range(1, 1000)]
f(); f()
